name: GGJ 20 - Repaisland
description:
This Game is an Entry to  Global Game Jam, The event that brings the world of game development and the creative media  community together  for 48 hours to practice their game making skills.

Description

The initial goal of our project was to create a  walk around investigation game where you explores floating township and help its people to repair the derelict craft and reach the lonesome bell tower and claim a prize.

We are very sorry, blame bitbucket.

How to Play:

Use W,A,S,D to move around the world and E to interact with People and Objects relevant to the story. (Thes may glow)

Credits
